thread.title: Balwyn's Montebello full of 'gorgeous, tasteful, stylish, little gorgeous things'
thread.title_full: Balwyn's Montebello full of 'gorgeous, tasteful, stylish, little gorgeous things'

author: Michael Harry
title: Balwyn's Montebello full of 'gorgeous, tasteful, stylish, little gorgeous things'
text:
Retail therapy: Montebello Emporium in Camberwell. Photo: Supplied 

MONTEBELLO EMPORIUM 
When Edina Monsoon opened a shop full of "gorgeous, tasteful, stylish, little gorgeous things" in Absolutely Fabulous , she might have had something like Montebello in mind. This second, larger branch of the homewares and clothing store is the kind of place where you'll walk in looking for a candle and accidentally walk out with a new wardrobe. "Women really love my shop, it's not really a shop for men," says owner Kate Taylor, who sources the luxe pieces with a focus is on all things bright. The sleek space is spilling over with vibrant, graphic colours from labels such as Kate Spade New York, Life With Bird, Moziâ€‹, Jonathan Adler and Megan Park. There's stationery, dresses, jewellery, rugs, lotions and accessories. "Our ethos is 'everyday luxury', so you can buy a soap or you can buy a $200 cushion." Service is breezy and unpretentious, and customers range from their teens to their 80s. It's one of the few independent stores on chain-heavy Burke Road, and brings a touch of glam to the eastern 'burbs. "We just find the most gorgeous things we can," says Taylor. Cheers, sweetie.
Rear, 596 Burke Road, Camberwell, 03 9882 2179. Monday to Saturday 9.30am-5pm, Sunday 11am-3pm. montebelloemporium.com.au
